basics.name: Ashish Kumar
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a Student of Indian Institute Of Information Technology Kota (India), pursuing my B.Tech in Computer Science And Engineering . Learning from various Fields like Competitive Programming and Web Development .

work.summary: Worked on improving websites and did requirement analysis on SaaS products alongside, initiated & developed business required documents for the SaaS products which required product analysis of their modules, and worked on initiating and improvising product timelines and estimations.

awards.title: GoDaddy Sponsor Winner At Hacking Heist 2.0 (Hackathon)

publications.title: Project - FLipY - NFTs MarketPlace For ECommerce Website
publications.details:
▸An Ecommerce Web app which transfers Warranty Cards as NFTs on a blockchain network. \
                            ▸Features: \
		                → Transfer and Prove Authencity of Product on Resale with decaying NFTs of Warranty Cards \
                                → Uses Smart Contract, and MarketPlace to view, buy and sell. \
                            ▸This project was part of Flipkart Grid 4.0 2022, in which our team was the top 1% participant. \
                            ▸Tech: Solidity, Hardhat, Nodejs, React, MongoDB, OpenSea, Alchemy, Pinata, Openzeppelin, Remix, Metamask.

publications.title: Project - VoiceForm
publications.details:
▸An Online Form which uses voice to fill in details.  \
                            ▸Part of a hackathon(Hacking Heist 2.0), in which my team won the sponsor title of GoDaddy. \
                            ▸This project was part of Flipkart Grid 4.0 2022, in which our team was the top 1% participant. \
                            ▸Tech: React, AlanAI, HTML, CSS
